# Stela llms.txt
# HEAD: 4605e6fd3
# HEAD commit time: 2026-02-07T13:48:28-05:00
# Refresh: ./ops/bin/llms
# Pointer map to canonical docs and tools (no duplication).

## 0. Context Bundles
- llms-small.txt - Small canonical bundle (PoT, SoP head 10, TASK, llms.txt).
- llms-full.txt - Full canonical bundle (small + docs/MANUAL.md, docs/MAP.md, docs/GOVERNANCE.md, docs/ops/registry/PROJECTS.md, docs/library/INDEX.md).
- llms-ops.txt - Ops bundle (manuals, ops binaries, lints, and specs).
- llms-governance.txt - Governance bundle (PoT, SoP, TASK, governance docs, and manifests).

## 1. Governance & Jurisdictions
- PoT.md - Policy of Truth: constitution, staffing, jurisdiction, and enforcement.
- docs/GOVERNANCE.md - Non-negotiables and project coherence rules.

## 2. State & Continuity
- SoP.md - Historical ledger (State of Play).
- TASK.md - Active work surface, DP contract, and thread log.
- docs/MAP.md - Wayfinding for cross-session state.
- ops/lib/manifests/CONTEXT.md - Required context artifact checklist.
- ops/lib/manifests/LLMS.md - Scope bundle manifest for llms outputs.

## 3. Operations & Manuals
- docs/MANUAL.md - Command mechanics and cheat sheet.
- docs/library/INDEX.md - Curated index of approved operator surfaces.
- docs/library/SKILLS.md - Skills promotion template and packet ledger.
- docs/INDEX.md - Documentation front door.

## 4. Operational Binaries
- ops/bin/open - Prompt generation and freshness gate.
- ops/bin/dump - State capture for agent ingestion.
- ops/bin/llms - Context bundle generation and llms.txt refresh.
- ops/bin/map - Auto-generated MAP block maintenance.
- ops/bin/context - Context archive assembly (OPEN + DUMP).
- ops/bin/help - Context-aware documentation search.
